title: Buying RP for mobile credits.
body:
Tried to buy 280 RP credits for 7.02CC(KM local currency).It says that it requires 2 messages,first message it accepts,second is unable to send...Ofc it eats 3.51 CC from my phone.Tried it twice and ccsupport.biz says im not blocked,so anyone have an advice and is it possible to get RP in value of the money it took from my phone?

(It took 7.02 CC from my phone but no RP recieved,usually I get message on gmail after transaction)

replies.body: If you're still having issues with this, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can look into this.  We'll help out with your specific issue individually, and will respond as soon as we can!
